title: REDUCED: 1906 Ullman Postcards - Christy Mathewson (HOF) SGC 1  RARE!

posts.post_title: REDUCED: 1906 Ullman Postcards - Christy Mathewson (HOF) SGC 1  RARE!
posts.post_content:
Up for sale today is a super rare 1906 Ullman Postcards - Christy Mathewson (HOF) graded an SGC 1. Back scan is available for serious buyer inquiry. Asking price is NLFS dlvd. Please PM me if interested and thank you for looking.



Phil
